bibl.title: The Geology and Papyrology of Hermopolis and Antinoopolis.
bibl.note: A geo-papyrological collaboration aims to explore the landscapes and documents that bear on the changing relationship between the two cities.

bibl.title: eTopoi. Journal for Ancient Studies. Special Volume.
Landscape Archaeology. Proceedings of the International Conference Held in Berlin, 6th - 8th June 2012

bibl.seg: Bunbury Judith and Myrto Malouta, The Geology and Papyrology of Hermopolis and Antinoopolis.

Wiebke Bebermeier, Robert Hebenstreit, Elke Kaiser and Jan Krause (Edd.), Landscape Archaeology. Proceedings of the International Conference Held in Berlin, 6th - 8th June 2012 = eTopoi. Journal for Ancient Studies. Special Volume. 3 (2012) pp. 119-122, 1 fig. [Uniquement accessible en ligne, en téléchargement gratuit: < http://journal.topoi.org/ >.]
A geo-papyrological collaboration aims to explore the landscapes and documents that bear on the changing relationship between the two cities.
